text: - Hi, my name's Laura Ellis
and I'm a VP of Data at Rapid7,

leading our internal and
external data platforms
as well as AI.

GenAI is impacting the
cybersecurity industry, in this way

that it's impacting all
industries, in the sense

that we need to leverage
it to impact the efficacy
and efficiency of our business.

But there's an added twist
when it comes to cybersecurity.
We're in a constant game of cat and mouse

with threat actors and they
are absolutely leveraging GenAI
to try to get a competitive edge,
and we need to make sure

that we are also
leveraging this technology
to keep the scales balanced.

I think one of the biggest
misconceptions about GenAI

and the general public is
that it's this big scary thing
we can't control.

And there's elements
of that which are true.
It is a bit of a black box technology,
but we absolutely have control on the data

that we feed into it,
the models that we use,
and how we apply it.
And all it takes is good planning
from a business perspective to make sure

that we're doing things
in an appropriate way.

AWS helps my software
company be more agile.
When we have an idea,
going from idea, to building the thing,

to delivering it to
production is a lot faster.

Leveraging all of the
services out of the box
that AWS offers us.
(upbeat music)
